Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE, size_t COUNT>
class StaticArray< TYPE, COUNT >

This is a simple constant size array - essentially a checked wrapper around a C style array with some "sugar" methods.

This array has no additional space overhead, and range checking is only done in DEBUG configurations.

Example usage: See unit tests.
